title: Oops, No Khalyla, Carlos Storms Off
itunes:title: Oops, No Khalyla, Carlos Storms Off
description:

0:00 Who’s in Khalyla’s Seat?
3:25 Carlos’ Hair & Secret Eating Habits
7:44 Dating on Raya & Being Awkward Around an Ex
13:11 Carlos Coughed on Someone as a Joke and it Didn’t Go Well
16:33 Attractive People That Have Both Masculine and Feminine Qualities
18:54 When Carlos Went to Jail for Stealing
26:46 Annie’s Temporary Fixes Instead of Plastic Surgery
29:52 Dealing With Our Drunk Fans
33:24 TikTok’s Terms of Service
36:31 How Annie Makes Herself Feel Safe
40:48 The NASA Story That Made Carlos Walk Off Set
43:54 When Esther First Came to Los Angeles to Do Stand Up
46:50 Nope Review & M. Night Shyamalan Movies
51:24 Woman Sues Man for 10K After Being Stood Up on First Date
58:05 Will Carlos Return? Stay Tuned Next Week!
